verses.name: 2 Samuel 11:7
verses.text: And when Uriah was come unto him, David demanded of him how Joab did, and how the people did, and how the war prospered.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 11:8
verses.text: And David said to Uriah, Go down to thy house, and wash thy feet. And Uriah departed out of the king’s house, and there followed him a mess of meat from the king.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 11:9
verses.text: But Uriah slept at the door of the king’s house with all the servants of his lord, and went not down to his house.
